result.eng: Nixon utterly hated the Kennedy family.
result.ga: Bhí an ghráin dhearg ag Nixon ar chlann Kennedy
result.orig: Bhí an ghráin dhearg ag Nixon ar chlann Kennedy
result.html: Bhí an ghráin dhearg ag Nixon ar chlann KennedyNixon utterly hated the Kennedy family.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an ġráin ḋearg ag Nixon ar ċlann KennedyNixon utterly hated the Kennedy family.

result.eng: He visited his children, all of them married by that time.
result.ga: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sin
result.orig: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sin
result.html: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sinHe visited his children, all of them married by that time.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé cuairt ar a ċlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sinHe visited his children, all of them married by that time.

result.html: A chlann mhacHis sons.
result.ponchtml: A ċlann ṁacHis sons.

result.eng: Do you have a special price for a family?
result.ga: An bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlann
result.orig: An bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlann
result.html: An bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlannDo you have a special price for a family?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil praġas speisialta agaiḃ do ċlannDo you have a special price for a family?

result.eng: This is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.
result.ga: Is é seo an chéad uair go bhfuil mise agus mo chlann ar saoire le chéile ó shin
result.orig: Is é seo an chéad uair go bhfuil mise agus mo chlann ar saoire le chéile ó shin
result.html: Is é seo an chéad uair go bhfuil mise agus mo chlann ar saoire le chéile ó shinThis is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.
result.ponchtml: Is é seo an ċéad uair go ḃfuil mise agus mo ċlann ar saoire le ċéile ó ẛinThis is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.

result.eng: I am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ga: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.orig: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.html: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ponchtml: Is bean tí mé agus ní ḃíonn mórán seans agam laḃairt le daoine eile seaċas m'ḟear agus mo ċlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.

result.eng: Julian is the oldest in the family.
result.ga: Is é Julian an duine is sine sa chlann
result.orig: Is é Julian an duine is sine sa chlann
result.html: Is é Julian an duine is sine sa chlannJulian is the oldest in the family.
result.ponchtml: Is é Julian an duine is sine sa ċlannJulian is the oldest in the family.

result.eng: Eithne is the youngest in the family.
result.ga: Is í Eithne an duine is óige sa chlann
result.orig: Is í Eithne an duine is óige sa chlann
result.html: Is í Eithne an duine is óige sa chlannEithne is the youngest in the family.
result.ponchtml: Is í Eiṫne an duine is óige sa ċlannEithne is the youngest in the family.

result.eng: I'm the eldest (of the children) in the family.
result.ga: Is mise an duine is sine sa chlann
result.orig: Is mise an duine is sine sa chlann
result.html: Is mise an duine is sine sa chlannI'm the eldest (of the children) in the family.
result.ponchtml: Is mise an duine is sine sa ċlannI'm the eldest (of the children) in the family.

result.eng: I live in a detached house with my wife and my children.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach scoite le mo bhean agus mo chlann
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach scoite le mo bhean agus mo chlann
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí i dteach scoite le mo bhean agus mo chlannI live in a detached house with my wife and my children.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí i dteaċ scoite le mo ḃean agus mo ċlannI live in a detached house with my wife and my children.
